Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Crime | Drama
Status: Final Season
Network: ITV1 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Mondays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: January, 2006
Episode Order: 6

Inspector Lewis returns to Oxford from a two-year attachment overseas and is immediately imbroiled in the murder of an American student.

Soon the bodies begin to pile up as Lewis copes with a very bright assistant and a female boss who plainly doesn't have much respect for him.

(http://www.tvrage.com/Lewis)
